User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Lotomania Master application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Game.title: Game
Game.description: Represents a Lotomania game created by a user.

ownerId.description: The user who created the game.

title.description: Title or name given to the game by the user.

numbers.description: Array of arrays, where each inner array represents a bet (50 numbers).

criteria.description: Generation criteria used for the game.

templateId.description: Optional reference to the template used to create the game.

Template.title: Template
Template.description: Represents a game generation template saved by a user.

ownerId.description: The user who created the template.

criteria.description: Generation criteria associated with the template.

Upload.title: Upload
Upload.description: Represents a file upload containing game data or statistics.

ownerId.description: The user who initiated the upload.

filePath.description: Path to the uploaded file in Firebase Storage.

DownloadHistory.title: DownloadHistory
DownloadHistory.description: Represents the history of game downloads by users.

userId.description: The user who downloaded the game.

/users/{userId}/games/{gameId}.description: Stores game data created by a user.

/users/{userId}/templates/{templateId}.description: Stores game templates created by a user.

/users/{userId}/uploads/{uploadId}.description: Stores metadata about file uploads initiated by a user.

/users/{userId}/downloadHistory/{downloa.description: Stores the download history of games by users.
